explains: n. 公众注意的中心；（舞台照明用的）石灰光，石灰光灯
wordGroup: in the limelight 引人注目

sentences.en: Tony has now been thrust into the limelight, with a high-profile job.
sentences.cn: 托尼有一份令人注目的工作，现在已成为人们关注的焦点。

sentences.en: A male bird of paradise may put himself in the limelight by displaying his spectacular plumage in the best stage setting to attract a female.
sentences.cn: 一只雄性天堂鸟可能会在最佳的场合中展示他华美的羽毛使自己成为关注的焦点，从而吸引雌性。

sentences.en: She seems fond of the limelight.
